channel.title: Commentaires sur : Gérard Chenet
channel.description: Pour valoriser la littérature et la culture du monde insulaire francophone

item.title: Par : Sobo Badé – «On voyage pour changer non de lieux, mais pour changer d'idées» Hyppolite Taine
item.dc:creator: Sobo Badé – «On voyage pour changer non de lieux, mais pour changer d'idées» Hyppolite Taine
item.description: […] Badé is a very beautiful artist colony that was started by a Haitian man named Gérard Chenet. According to the driver who took us to Dakar, Doudou, he was a revolutionary in his country that […]
item.content:encoded: […] Badé is a very beautiful artist colony that was started by a Haitian man named Gérard Chenet. According to the driver who took us to Dakar, Doudou, he was a revolutionary in his country that […]

item.title: Par : Senegal a la vigília del Tabaski
item.dc:creator: Senegal a la vigília del Tabaski
item.description: […] l’hotel i centre cultural Sobo Badé, construït per l’escriptor, arquitecte i artista Gérard Chenet. Nascut el 1927 a Port-au-Prince, Haití, Chenet va estudiar a França i Canadà i va viure uns […]
